app.containers.AboutUs.description: We know you'd like to know more about us, but we're currently working on higher priority content. Don't despair! Soon you will surely learn a lot of interesting things. In the meantime, you can visit <liga>league detail</liga> and see how your favorite team is doing. Or you can find out information about the upcoming <mcrvc>Czech Championship</mcrvc>.

app.containers.League.Overview.descripti: Under the auspices of the VietcongHUB server, various leagues are held, in which new seasons are regularly replaced. In each season, we will closely monitor your statistics, based on which you can win many awards! So don't hesitate, explore and join the league according to your preferences.
app.containers.League.Overview.title: Leagues and Seasons

app.containers.Mcrvc.description: The Czech Republic Championship in Vietcong, aka MČRVC, has been held since 2010. Apart from a few interruptions, it is held regularly on the last weekend of September. Over the years, it has also been held in the spring term, at the end of March/April. This year is no exception, and other events are already planned for both terms. Book the following terms!
app.containers.Mcrvc.moreInfo: For more information, follow the FB page:
app.containers.Mcrvc.title: MČRVC
